page.title: 01GAZETEER OF SUTTON VENY AREA
page.content: We live in a rural area.It is mainly farmland and is part of the Wylye Valley. There are some hamlets and a village called Sutton Veny. In the centre of the village is a church and a school with a large field for playing sports, and an adventure playground by the side. The hall next to the school is shared by the school and the village. Sutton Veny is mainly a linear village with a population of about seven hundred people. There are lots of hills surrounding Sutton Veny. The River Wylye runs nearby, where you can fish for trout. We have quite a few farms in the area and lots of big houses as well as cottages and some new houses. There is a lot of woodland, one large wood is called Southleigh Woods.
